scripts.prepublishOnly: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const npmignorePath = path.join(__dirname, 'template', '.npmignore'); const backupPath = path.join(__dirname, 'template', 'npmignore.bak'); if (fs.existsSync(npmignorePath)) fs.renameSync(npmignorePath, backupPath);"
scripts.postpublish: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const backupPath = path.join(__dirname, 'template', 'npmignore.bak'); const npmignorePath = path.join(__dirname, 'template', '.npmignore'); if (fs.existsSync(backupPath)) fs.renameSync(backupPath, npmignorePath);"
